translations: 尖刻的；锐利的；苛刻的；锋利的（名词 trenchancy, 副词 trenchantly）

sentences.sentence: His com we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  was trenchant and perceptive.

sentences.sentence: He resigned in the face of trenchant criticism of his policies.
sentences.translation: 他在这番尖锐的批评前持屈从的态度。

sentences.sentence: Some of their com we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao s were quite trenchant.
